definition: basalt/also written 玄熔岩[xuan2 rong2 yan2]

sentences.english: At Lava Hot Springs in Idaho, visitors may bathe in the thermal mineral waters.
sentences.chinese: 当热熔岩在爱德荷州爆发，参观者可以去那里泡温泉。

sentences.english: Horses are herded to safety away from the volcanic cloud.
sentences.chinese: 成群的马匹正飞奔逃离火山熔岩灰雾。

sentences.english: The lake was possibly ponded by lavas.
sentences.chinese: 这个湖可能是熔岩堵塞河道形成的。

sentences.english: One of the characteristics of lava and debris valleys is a U-shaped transverse profile.
sentences.chinese: 熔岩流及泥石流谷的特点之一是横剖面为U型。

sentences.english: The Cascades are made up of lavas and volcanic materials.
sentences.chinese: Cascade山脉是由熔岩以及火山物组成的。

sentences.english: Constant bubbling sends waves of lava lapping over the rim.
sentences.chinese: 不断的鼓泡会将起伏的熔岩从边缘溢出。

sentences.english: The Blue Lagoon is a mineral-rich seawater lake heated by lava.
sentences.chinese: 蓝泻湖是一个由火山熔岩形成的咸水湖，富含矿物质。

sentences.english: The volcanics in the Beishan area, consisting mainly of lava and tuff, are well developed and linearly distributed.
sentences.chinese: 北山地区火山岩发育，以熔岩和凝灰岩为主。

sentences.english: Lava boiled up from the crater of the volcano.
The volcano vomited flames and molten rock.
These are globules of once-molten rock trapped inside crystals in the rock.
sentences.chinese: 这些源自熔岩的球状岩石被包裹在橄榄石晶体里。

sentences.english: He kept out deadly fumes wearing his own gas mask and sucked water from a lava tube.
sentences.chinese: 他带着防毒面具将浓烟雾挡住，从熔岩管中吸水喝。

sentences.english: The kundahlini moves up the spine like hot lava and out the top of the head.
sentences.chinese: 让昆达里尼象炽热熔岩一样沿脊柱向上并跃出头顶。

sentences.english: The Blue Lagoon is a mineral-rich seawater lake heated by lava2.
sentences.chinese: 蓝泻湖是一个由火山熔岩形成的咸水湖，富含矿物质。

sentences.english: There are infiltration center on lava and agglomerates .
sentences.chinese: 在熔岩或集块岩上有渗漏中心存在。

sentences.english: Molten lava erupted from the top of the volcano.
sentences.chinese: 熔岩从火山顶喷了出来。

definition: variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
